channel.title: 51. Sprint (Billpay Ticketsystem)
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [IPL-11307] Follow Up - DD/AUT: Provide Risk-Levels
item.description:
Introduction

We have to provide risk levels for direct debit AUT.

Description / Change Request

Adapt following tables with default values.

ipaylater_customer.risk_level
ipaylater_customer.risk_level_requirement
ipaylater_customer.rating_provider_response

Use the exact same risk-levels like for INV/AUT.

TODO
  • provide risk levels
  • test

item.title: [IPL-11306] Follow Up - DD/AUT: Adjust merchant reimbursement / merchant Invoice process
item.description:
Introduction

We have to implement a new label for DD/AUT for our merchant invoice.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
No-Status-Quo Merchant Invoice for DD/AUT

The new merchant invoices for DD/AUT will have the same structure like for DD/DEU, just a different label. Therefore we have to extend ipaylater_data.invoice_group and ipaylater_data.invoice_group_items.
The DD/DEU HTML template set needs to be copied for AUT.(Just different Footer)

New labels for DD/AUT:

Rechnung: R2013/xxxxx
Gutschrift: EURAT-DD-G2013/xxxxx

TODO Stefan: we need the PDF template for AUT

TODO
  • adjust ipaylater_data.invoice_group
  • adjust ipaylater_data.invoice_group_items
  • copy HTML templates
  • create regression tests for merchant_reimbursement and merchant_invoice process
item.summary: Follow Up - DD/AUT: Adjust merchant reimbursement / merchant Invoice process

item.title: [IPL-11296] INV/NL: Adjust Load Queue
item.description:
Introduction

We have to create a new branch in the load queue to process the bank transactions for INV/NLD. There will be a static bank account and no virtual bank account.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
NO-Status-Quo New branch in the load queue to process INV/NLD bank transactions
  • Adjust proc ipaylater_debt.process_debt_transaction_load_queue(integer).
  • New branch in "LBB/Sparkasse - invoice NLD" for NLD for the new bank account (see IPL-11295).
  • Use fuzzy/purpose matching
  • Will be the same purpose as for INV/DEU.
  • Configure account in aqBanking tool and import bank transactions into the load queue (IT-Op).
TODO
  • new branch in load queue
  • configure account in aqBanking tool (IT-Op)
  • import bank transactions (IT-Op)
  • test

item.title: [IPL-11285] INV/NL: Adjust Deltavista Web Service (DV/OC2)
item.description:
Introduction

We have to adjust our Deltavista web service v2 for INV/NDL. We have to send 1 addtional parameter (telefon number)

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
Only DEU requests Extended requests for INV/NDL

We will use Order Check 2 (OC2) interface, for requesting Experian via Deltavista for INV/NLD.
Therefore we have to adjust DeltaVistaV2ServiceImpl class for NDL DV OC2 requests.

The request almost look the same like for DEU, just telefon number is new.( & <country>NLD</country>)

New Value:

  • Telefon number (new value to send)
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
   <soapenv:Header>
      <axis2ns4:messageContext soapenv:mustUnderstand="0" xmlns:axis2ns4="http://www.deltavista.com/dspone/ordercheck-if/V001">
         <credentials xmlns="http://www.deltavista.com/dspone/ordercheck-if/V001">
            <user>Test_Guardean_xml</user>
            <password>xxxxxx</password>
         </credentials>
         <correlationID xmlns="http://www.deltavista.com/dspone/ordercheck-if/V001">CH-456321</correlationID>
      </axis2ns4:messageContext>
   </soapenv:Header>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <orderCheckRequest xmlns="http://www.deltavista.com/dspone/ordercheck-if/V001">
         <product>
            <name>CreditCheckConsumer</name>
            <country>NLD</country>
            <proofOfInterest>ABK</proofOfInterest>
         </product>
         <searchedAddress>
            <legalForm>PERSON</legalForm>
            <address>
               <name>Vis</name>
               <firstName>P</firstName>
               <gender>MALE</gender>
               <dateOfBirth>19410801</dateOfBirth>
               <location>
                  <street>Rivium 1e Straat</street>
                  <house>2</house>
                  <city>Burgerveen</city>
                  <zip>2154MK</zip>
                  <country>NLD</country>
               </location>
            </address>
         </searchedAddress>
         <clientData>
            <reference>777777</reference>
            <order>
               <contact>
                  <item>phone</item>
                  <value>0172500735</value>
               </contact>
               <channel>HOME24</channel>
            </order>
         </clientData>
      </orderCheckRequest>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
TODO
  • Adjust DV web service
  • test

item.title: [IPL-11283] INV/NL: Adjust API validation
item.description:
Introduction

We have to adjust our merchant service for INV/NDL, because telefone number is now mandatory.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
Telefon number is optional Telefon number is mandatory
  • Telefon number mandatory for INV/NLD, therefore we have to extend the "validator-config.xml" (extend "condition" var for property "address.phone").
  • Create regression tests
TODO
  • adjust it!
  • create regression test

item.title: [IPL-11280] INV/NL: Configure DB default values
item.description:
Introduction

We need several default values, when we generate a portal for INV/NL. Therefore we have to extend several tables.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
No-Status-Quo Default Values for Portals INV/NL

Extend following tables:

ipaylater_merchant.def_configuration_lettershop

dcl_id 101 102
dcl_country NLD NLD
dcl_currency EUR EUR
dcl_payment_method 1 1
dcl_lettershop_type 1 (first dunning) 2 (second dunning)
dcl_lettershop_enabled FALSE FALSE
dcl_lettershop_amt_from 0 0
dcl_lettershop_supported_operation FALSE FALSE

ipaylater_merchant.def_configuration_localized table

dcloc_id 8
dcloc_country NLD
dcloc_currency EUR
dcloc_upper_bound_deviating_shipping_address 0
dcloc_increase_tolerance_percentage 0
dcloc_increase_tolerance_amount 2500

ipaylater_merchant.def_configuration_notification

dcn_id serial 97 98 99 100 101 102
dcn_notification_type 2 5 6 7 8 10
dcn_relative_to_due_date FALSE TRUE FALSE TRUE TRUE FALSE
dcn_mailing_enabled FALSE TRUE FALSE TRUE TRUE TRUE
dcn_mailing_offset 00:00:00 -3 days -3 days 5 days 18 days 00:00:00
dcn_due_date_offset 00:00:00 00:00:00 00:00:00 15 days 25 days 00:00:00
dcn_additional_fees integer 0 0 0 0 750 0
dcn_payment_method 1 1 1 1 1 1
dcn_lettershop_enabled FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE
dcn_country NLD NLD NLD NLD NLD NLD
dcn_lettershop_amt_from 0 0 0 0 0 0
dcn_currency EUR EUR EUR EUR EUR EUR
Notification Types
  • 2 SEND_INVOICE
  • 5 SEND_FIRST_PAYMENT_NOTIFICATION
  • 6 SEND_SECOND_PAYMENT_NOTIFICATION
  • 7 SEND_FIRST_DUNNING_NOTIFICATION
  • 8 SEND_SECOND_DUNNING_NOTIFICATION
  • 10 SEND_PARTIAL_PAYMENT_NOTIFICATION

ipaylater_merchant.def_portal_configuration_fee

dpcf_id 19
dpcf_currency EUR
dpcf_country NLD
dpcf_payment_method 1
dpcf_disagio_additional_units 150
dpcf_minimal_fee_units 150
dpcf_cancellation_fee_units 150
dpcf_disagio 4.9

ipaylater_merchant.def_configuration_inkasso

dci_id 26 27
dci_country NLD NLD
dci_currency EUR EUR
dci_days_after 5 5
dci_start_event_id 2 2
dci_partner_id 10 10
dci_valid_from
dci_valid_to
dci_percentage 100 100
dci_min_debt_amount 1000 1000
dci_max_debt_amount
dci_payment 1 1
dci_customer_group 0 1

Activate/enable in ipaylater_data.country_list table the NDL/EUR field (TRUE)

Risk-Levels

Deltavista V2

Risk Levels are attached (Risk Levels Holland.xlsx)

ipaylater_customer.risk_level
ipaylater_customer.risk_level_requirement
ipaylater_customer.rating_provider_response

Note: Used attached sql as a template.

TODO
  • extend tables
  • activate NDL/EUR
  • test portal generation

comments.comment: @ Matthias: Please provide default risk levels
@ Arne: Please confirm default inkasso settings.

Also, Scoreband und Risk Levels befinden sich in der Excel:

Das Scoreband sollte so passen, die Betragsobergrenzen sind Default Werte, für home24 brauchen wir aber höhere Obergrenzen.

Auch die Default Obergrenzen werden allerdings sicher noch einmal Angepasst werden müssen, weil ich nur sehr grobe Infos über die Scoreverteilungen von Deltavista erhalten habe. Da müssen wir später schauen, wie sich die Kunden bei uns dann wirklich zusammensetzen.

Beste Grüße

item.title: [IPL-11276] INV/NL: Configure UMS templates
item.description:
Introduction

We have to introduce new UMS templates for our end customer communication for INV/NL in dutch.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
No- Status-Quo New templates for INV/NL

New templates are:

  • 75164 NL - PM 1 - Full Paid
  • 75165 NL - PM 1 - Partially Paid
  • 75166 NL - PM 1 - Invoice
  • 75167 NL - PM 1 - Changed Order
  • 75170 NL - PM 1 - Cancel
  • 75171 NL - PM 1 - Dunning 1
  • 75172 NL - PM 1 - Dunning 2
  • 75217 NL - PM 1 - Reminder 1
  • 75309 NL - PM 1 - Dunning 1 & 2 Removal [MsgTypeId=32]

Since the templates are not ready yet we will start with copying the german templates.

Note: There will be NO lettershop for the beginning.

TODO
  • provide new templates

comments.comment:
Templates are all generated in our UMS system and are now being tested (as far as PRODUCTS can test these things)
We will keep you posted.

item.title: [IPL-11274] INV/NL: Translate Data Protection and API error messages
item.description:
Introduction

For our new INV/NL, we need new AGB and data protection text.

Description / Change Request
As-Is-Status Should-Be-Status
NO- Status-Quo New AGBs etc. for INV/NL
  • add translation pages for API & website terms
  • Add HTTP redirects in .htaccess to the new pages:
  • Add translated API error messages and test.
  • Add country NLD to web site (Christian)

Website version: https://www.billpay.de/klant/av-nl#privacybescherming
API inline version: https://www.billpay.de/api/av-nl#privacybescherming

• AGB = Algemene voorwaarden (AV)
• Kunden = klant
• Datenschutz = privacybescherming

TODO
  • provide new text
item.summary: INV/NL: Translate Data Protection and API error messages

item.title: [IPL-11288] PRF: 3) Find and remove memory leak in Java applications
item.description:
Currently the memory on de04 is exhausted after approx. 5 days (see http://monitoring.billpay.de/hobbit-cgi/bb-hostsvc.sh?HOST=de04.billpay.intern&SERVICE=memory). Probably the same happens on de02 but there it is harder to track. The reason is that the memory consumption of the test BO (and API?) increases until the memory starts to swap.

Check also API.

  • The goal of this User Story is to stablize the anount of memory cosumed by API and BO.
  • Add memory dump to this ticket.
  • analyze memory cosumption by grid loading in BO
item.summary: PRF: 3) Find and remove memory leak in Java applications

comments.comment:
[14:31:01] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -XX:HeapDumpPath=[path-to-heapdump]
[14:31:06] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): when we will have out of memory
[14:31:10] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): we could configure
[14:31:11] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): and analize
[14:46:40] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): https://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/jdk/tools/memoryanalyzer/
[14:47:11] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): i just installed http://www.eclipse.org/mat/
[15:44:15] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): Is it normal when you remove dunning from DD or INV, that the debt state stays unchanged?
[15:54:22] Jan Wehrs: but we are not running on a IBM jvm
[15:54:27] Jan Wehrs: is that a problem?
[16:09:39] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): its not a problem
[16:09:44] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): the second tool is ok
[16:09:53] Wiesław Młynarski (Billpay): just have to figure out how to read from it

item.title: [IPL-10933] Refactor BillpayOrderState enum
item.description:
IS:
The enum is a combination of values from tables rating_validation_state and pre_validation_states. Right now we are using this enum for translation purpose in the backoffice.

SHOULD BE:
Remove this enum and replace it with a generic mechanism that loads the values from the tables. prevalidation states are already in the cache and ready to use, rating validation states not yet. Adjust translation files to use the names from pvs_detail and rvs_info.

comments.comment: Is necessary to close the ticket before live release of Sprint 50. Test should be made on the branch.
